question: Vishweshwar Hegde Kageri was unanimously elected as the Speaker of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly on 31 July 2019. Which number Speaker of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly he is?
option1: 20th Speaker of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly
option2: 21st Speaker of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly
option3: 22nd Speaker of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly
option4: 23rd Speaker of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly
answer: 22nd Speaker of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly
explanation: Vishweshwar Hegde Kageri was unanimously elected as the Speaker of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly on 31 July 2019. He is the 22nd Speaker of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly.
